serene.internal
Class UnsynchronizedInternalRNGFactory

java.lang.Object
  serene.internal.InternalRNGFactory
      serene.internal.UnsynchronizedInternalRNGFactory

public class UnsynchronizedInternalRNGFactory
extends InternalRNGFactory

The InternalRNGFactory class is not thread-safe and not re-entrant. One instance * is created for every InternalRNGSchemaFactory.
